mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`BCODE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`DEPTCODE`, t1.`DEPTID`, t1.`DEPTLEVEL`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`DOMAINS`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`LEADERID`, t1.`LEADERNAME`, t1.`ORGID`, t11.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PDEPTID`, t21.`DEPTNAME` AS `PDEPTNAME`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHOWORDER`, t1.`UPDATEDATE` FROM `IBZDEPT` t1 LEFT JOIN IBZORG t11 ON t1.ORGID = t11.ORGID LEFT JOIN IBZDEPT t21 ON t1.PDEPTID = t21.DEPTID ) t1 where deptid=#{id}
